channel.title: [614] Compiling Problem [614]
channel.description:
Okay, on my compiler i have linked it to the correct Java place, but it seems not be working here is the Compiler code [*TXT*] : [code]@echo off echo Compiling everything. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/dialogues/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/interfaces/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/objects/*.java pause
[/code]
here is the error : [code]"The system cannot find the path specified"[/code]
Help please?

item.title: [614] Compiling Problem [614]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I believe you need to find the path of your JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: [614] Compiling Problem [614]
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

Okay, on my compiler i have linked it to the correct Java place, but it seems not be working here is the Compiler code [TXT] :

[code]@echo off
echo Compiling everything.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/dialogues/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/interfaces/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/items/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/scripts/objects/.java
pause

[/code]

here is the error :

Help please?
